title: Labelling of socket-outlets
fullText:
Low voltage socket-outlets shall be labelled to identify all source(s) of supply when multiple sources of supply are installed.
The labelling shall be â€”
(a) legible; and
(b) durable; and
(c) in the English language; and
(d) located at each socket-outlet.
See Figure 3.2 for examples of labelling that may be used.
